definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: fish (NH id.)—[[דָּגׇה]] Nu 11:5 + 5 t.; cstr. [[דְּגַת]] Ge 1:26 + 4 t. + Ez Eze 29:4 b (del. B Co); sf. [[דְּגׇתוֹ]] Ez Eze 47:10 LXX Vulgate Co; (MT [[דגתם]]), [[דְּגׇתָם]] Is 50:2, Ps 105:29 + Ez Eze 47:10 MT cf. supr.—fish, almost always coll.; fish of sea [[דְּגַת הַיׇּם]] Ge 1:26, Ge 1:28 (P) Ez Eze 47:10 (in sim.); in Nile ([[יְאׂר]]) Ex 7:18, Ex 7:21 (E) cf. Ps 105:29, [[דְּגַת יְאׂרֶיךָ]] Ez Eze 29:4, Eze 29:4 (cf. supr.) v:Eze 29:5; in sea and rivers Is 50:2, Ez Eze 47:9, Eze 47:10; food in Egypt Nu 11:5 (JE); image of fish forbidden in worship, as of beasts and birds De 4:18 (on sacredness of fish, and use in sacrifice cf. Selden:De Diis Syris, ii. 3. RS:Sern. i. 274); of single fish only Jon 2:1 (Jon 1:17, Jon 1:17, Jon 2:10 [[דָּג]]) by late usage; cf. conversely [[דָּאג]] = [[דָּגׇה]]coll. Ne 13:16.
